name: Goat in a Coat
description:
This game will run via keybord and controller.

For movement use:    W A S D    /    Left Stick

For fighting use:           H J K          /     West North South Buttons

We all know the danger of ninja carrot thieves. However the farmer is a lazy guy and does nothing to save the delicious carrots. Therefore the bravest of goats has to defeat them. But the farmer won't let him leave the farm, as he is just a goat.

You will have to help him find some friends to fool the farmer and fight the ninjas! And maybe you will find out who is behind all this carrot-stealing-business...

🥕   Have fun

 

This is part of our first game jam and also the first game we published - we made it together, geriyon and nym-phi. We made all assets by ourselves. We had a fun time creating it and would be glad if you enjoy playing it. Leave some comments if you're in the mood, we appreciate constructive criticism.
